cds::opt::lock_type< TYPE > Struct Template Reference

Option setter specifies lock class [type-option]. More...

#include <cds/opt/options.h>

Detailed Description

template<typename TYPE>
struct cds::opt::lock_type< TYPE >

Option setter specifies lock class [type-option].

Specification of the TYPE class is: 

        struct Lock {
            void lock() ;
            void unlock() ;
        };
